cards.title: Multi-Agent Orchestration
cards.description: Dynamic frameworks where specialized agents adapt in real-time—stages shift, roles evolve, strategies emerge.
cards.tagline: Not static pipelines. Adaptive task forces.

cards.title: The Void
cards.description: A voice AI companion that lives within your codebase. Understands your project, answers questions, helps you build. Your code, conversational.

cards.title: AI-Native Platform Ecosystem
cards.description: Products that orbit, attract, and accelerate: rapid UI generation, cinematic video synthesis, autonomous marketing, VSL engines, multi-agent workstations.
cards.tagline: An ecosystem with its own gravitational field.

cards.title: Token Compression Research
cards.description: Up to 80% token reduction for code I/O. Session compaction achieves 2.5× information density at just 30% token overhead.
cards.tagline: Same output quality. 2× efficiency per token.

cards.title: Claude Code Tooling
cards.description: Session management with advanced search and improved compaction. Real-time statuslines with cost tracking. Memory systems for persistent context across projects.

cards.title: Autonomous Coding Systems
cards.description: Desktop apps and harnesses for AI-driven development. Git worktree isolation, self-validating QA loops, Linear integration. Systems that build while you sleep.
